title: Randomly dc from client
body:
http://imgur.com/a/hH4F5

I was able to remain in my Discord call fine... is this a connection issue?

replies.body: It's most likely happening if your network lost its connection with our servers, which being connected to discord doesn't mean you're still connected to our servers. Check out the steps in this [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, but pay extra attention to port forwarding and how to flush your DNS.
Ahhh okay. I figured it may be a connection issue, but I wasn't sure.
